name: photography
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 the activity or job of taking photographs or filming: She's taking an evening class in photography. The film won an award for its photography.
More examplesFewer examplesaerial photographyAre you going to enter the photography competition?It's a bit of trick photography - she's meant to look like she's walking on water.We were all really knocked out by the film, especially the photography.time-lapse photography
